title: System Maintenance Notice
content: The Lost & Found portal will be undergoing maintenance on October 1st from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM IST. The service may be temporarily unavailable during this period.

title: Welcome to KLU Lost & Found
content: Welcome to the KLU Lost & Found portal. Please make sure to report any lost or found items through our system. Thank you for helping keep our campus organized!
